data.lyric:
[ti:Heartless (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Heartless (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heartless (Explicit) - The Weeknd
[00:05.14]Lyrics by：Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Leland Tyler Wayne/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Andre Eric Proctor
[00:10.28]Composed by：Abel "The Weeknd" Tesfaye/Leland Tyler Wayne/Carlo "Illangelo" Montagnese/Andre Eric Proctor
[00:15.43]Sheesh
[00:19.38]I shouldn't rush it
[00:23.35]Never need a b***h I'm what a b***h need
[00:25.57]B***h need
[00:26.25]Trying to find the one that can fix me
[00:29.07]I've been dodgin' death in the six speed
[00:31.50]Amphetamine got my stomach feelin' sickly
[00:35.19]Yeah I want it all now
[00:37.27]I've been runnin' through the p***y need a dog pound
[00:40.00]Hundred models gettin' faded in the compound
[00:42.75]Trying to love me but they never get a pulse down
[00:46.42]Why
[00:47.16]'Cause I'm heartless
[00:48.58]And I'm back to my ways 'cause I'm heartless
[00:51.35]All this money and this fame got me heartless
[00:54.11]Low life for life 'cause I'm heartless
[00:58.35]Said I'm heartless
[00:59.79]Trying to be a better man but I'm heartless
[01:02.63]Never be a weddin' plan but I'm heartless
[01:05.41]Low life for life 'cause I'm heartless
[01:09.60]Said I'm heartless
[01:11.04]So much p***y it be fallin' out the pocket
[01:13.87]Metro Boomin turn this h*e into a moshpit
[01:16.77]Tesla pill got me flyin' like a cockpit
[01:20.22]Yeah I got her watchin'
[01:22.49]Call me up turn that p***y to a faucet
[01:25.29]Duffel bags full of d**gs and a rocket
[01:28.04]Stix drunk but he never miss a target
[01:31.55]Photoshoots I'm a star now
[01:33.44]Star
[01:33.71]I'm talkin' Time Rolling Stone and Bazaar now
[01:36.13]'Zaar
[01:36.50]Sellin' dreams to these girls with their guard down
[01:39.00]What
[01:39.24]Seven years I've been swimmin' with the sharks now
[01:42.97]Why
[01:43.59]'Cause I'm heartless
[01:44.98]And I'm back to my ways 'cause I'm heartless
[01:47.73]All this money and this fame got me heartless
[01:50.66]Low life for life 'cause I'm heartless
[01:54.77]Said I'm heartless
[01:56.28]Trying to be a better man but I'm heartless
[01:59.14]Never be a weddin' plan but I'm heartless
[02:01.94]Low life for life 'cause I'm heartless
[02:07.31]I lost my heart and my mind
[02:12.97]I try to always do right
[02:18.44]I thought I lost you this time
[02:24.06]You just came back in my life
[02:29.89]You never gave up on me
[02:34.22]Why don't you
[02:35.51]I'll never know what you see
[02:39.76]Why won't you
[02:41.13]I don't do well when alone
[02:45.42]Oh yeah
[02:46.80]You hear it clear in my tone
[02:51.40]'Cause I'm heartless
[02:52.78]And I'm back to my ways 'cause I'm heartless
[02:55.53]All this money and this fame got me heartless
[02:58.32]Low life for life 'cause I'm heartless
[03:02.62]Said I'm heartless
[03:03.93]Trying to be a better man but I'm heartless
[03:06.90]Never be a weddin' plan but I'm heartless
[03:09.65]Low life for life 'cause I'm heartless
data.trans:
[ti:Heartless (Explicit)]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Heartless (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.14]//
[00:10.28]//
[00:15.43]//
[00:19.38]我不该心急
[00:23.35]从来不需要女人 女人需要我
[00:25.57]女人需要
[00:26.25]想找一个可以治愈我的人
[00:29.07]我挂六档狂飙 躲避死神的追逐
[00:31.50]药物让我的胃有点不舒服
[00:35.19]现在我想要得到一切
[00:37.27]身边总是美女成群 已经快要无处容身
[00:40.00]一百个模特在这里 迷醉得不省人事
[00:42.75]想要爱我 但她们没有一点收获
[00:46.42]为什么
[00:47.16]因为我无情
[00:48.58]我已重回正轨 因为我无情
[00:51.35]金钱和名利 让我变得没心没肺
[00:54.11]一辈子离群索居 因为我无情
[00:58.35]我说 我很无情
[00:59.79]想要做个更好的男人 但我没心没肺
[01:02.63]从来没有结婚打算 我就是这种没心没肺的人
[01:05.41]一辈子离群索居 因为我无情
[01:09.60]我说 我很无情
[01:11.04]好多姑娘送上门 挡都挡不住
[01:13.87]Metro Boomin让这娘们开始狂舞
[01:16.77]那种玩意儿让我感觉飞上了太空
[01:20.22]我让她目不转睛盯着我
[01:22.49]联系我 我会让她欲罢不能
[01:25.29]手提袋里装满了货 还有一个大家伙
[01:28.04]Stix喝醉了 但他办事从来不会失手
[01:31.55]我现在是个明星了 相片登上杂志了
[01:33.44]明星
[01:33.71]我说的是《时代周刊》《滚石》还有《时尚芭莎》
[01:36.13]芭莎
[01:36.50]向这些姑娘兜售梦想 她们全都没有防备
[01:39.00]什么
[01:39.24]七年过去 现在我已经进入牛人的行列
[01:42.97]为什么
[01:43.59]因为我无情
[01:44.98]我已重回正轨 因为我无情
[01:47.73]金钱和名利 让我变得没心没肺
[01:50.66]一辈子离群索居 因为我无情
[01:54.77]我说 我很无情
[01:56.28]想要做个更好的男人 但我没心没肺
[01:59.14]从来没有结婚打算 我就是这种没心没肺的人
[02:01.94]一辈子离群索居 因为我无情
[02:07.31]我失去了信心 失去了理智
[02:12.97]我希望一直不犯错
[02:18.44]我以为这一次失去你了
[02:24.06]你竟然回到了我的生命中
[02:29.89]你从未放弃我
[02:34.22]为什么呢
[02:35.51]我永远不会明白你的想法
[02:39.76]你为什么不放弃我
[02:41.13]一个人的时候 我过得不好
[02:45.42]//
[02:46.80]你从我的语气就能听出来
[02:51.40]因为我无情
[02:52.78]我已重回正轨 因为我无情
[02:55.53]金钱和名利 让我变得没心没肺
[02:58.32]一辈子离群索居 因为我无情
[03:02.62]我说 我很无情
[03:03.93]想要做个更好的男人 但我没心没肺
[03:06.90]从来没有结婚打算 我就是这种没心没肺的人
[03:09.65]一辈子离群索居 因为我无情
